name: mrcssd
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0

stmt.pretty: syl3anc(w0, (c0 ` c1)⊆(c0 ` c2), c3 ∈(Moore ` c4), c1 ⊆ c2, c2 ⊆ c4)

-| wi(w0, wss(c2, c4))

-| wceq(c0, cfv(cmrc, c3))

comment: Moore closure preserves subset ordering. Deduction form of ~ mrcss . (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
